channel.title: Capa – AWS SRE - CloudWatch
channel.description: Recent content in AWS SRE - CloudWatch on Capa

item.title: Blog: CloudWatch - Log Insights
item.description:
一、网关搜索

A、查询接口以及响应码

fields @timestamp, @message
| filter @message like /(?i)(queryData)/
| filter @message like /(?i)("500")/
| sort @timestamp desc
| limit 100

二、应用搜索

A、TraceId检索

fields @timestamp, @message
| filter log._trace_id = '12345'
| sort @timestamp desc
| limit 20

B、应用检索

fields @timestamp, @message
| filter kubernetes.labels.appid = '12345'
| sort @timestamp desc
| limit 20

C、POD检索

fields @timestamp, @message
| filter kubernetes.pod_name = '12345-fb5f75b84-k5kgv'
| sort @timestamp desc
| limit 20

D、日志级别检索

fields @timestamp, @message
| filter log._log_level = 'INFO'
| sort @timestamp desc
| limit 20

E、异常模糊匹配

fields @timestamp, @message
| filter @message like 'HttpMediaTypeNotSupportedException'
| sort @timestamp desc
| limit 20
